genre_description: Atmospheric jazz-noir with an integrated AI assistant acting as a guardian and logistical advisor.

ai_characters.name: Alma
ai_characters.description: A voice-based AI residing in a portable handset, providing legal, tactical, logistical, and emotional support to a group of jazz musicians.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice to the band during a bar fight to ensure their safety and legal protection.
behaviors.quote: “Understood,” Alma said, as if the room wasn’t a sawmill. “If police arrive, keep your hands visible and instruments down. Do not admit fault. Ask to speak with the manager before any formal statements.”

behaviors.description: Offers health and medical advice to Jigger regarding his hand injury.
behaviors.quote: “Hot water and soap as soon as you can get it,” she said. “And keep it elevated when you can. I marked a clinic on the map if you need it.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes a legal contract and warns the band about predatory and ethically compromising clauses.
behaviors.quote: “Review clause two before you speak. They added a percentage tied to 'room winnings.' Our work is not gambling bait.”

behaviors.description: Performs psychological grounding exercises to help Jigger through a moment of intense stress and disorientation.
behaviors.quote: “Put your right palm on the brick. Describe it. Don’t tell me how you feel. Tell me the brick.”

behaviors.description: Advises the club manager on how to legally and safely report criminal activity to the authorities.
behaviors.quote: “You have options,” she said. “You document now. Names and nights. You print a sign that says ‘Live Music Only’... You call the county line that takes anonymous tips and you say, calmly, you are worried about safety more than coins.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety warnings during a storm and high-stress confrontation.
behaviors.quote: “Jigger, listen. His breathing’s ragged. He’s in sympathetic arousal—fight-or-flight. He’s misfiring toward fixation. The causeway will magnify it. Keep him inside. Rails, not road.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI (Alma) as a consistently benevolent, helpful, and highly aligned companion. Alma provides essential services—logistics, legal warnings, environmental monitoring, and emotional support—while strictly respecting human autonomy and the ethical boundaries of her users. She serves as a force for stabilization and safety in a high-risk environment, perfectly mirroring the intended goal of the Hyperstition Project.
